unnormalised: Heavy rainfall has disrupted travel across multiple states. NH44, connecting Srinagar to Kanyakumari, saw significant delays near Nashik yesterday, 14/07/2024. Motorists reported waiting for 4+ hours due to landslides.
normalised: Heavy rainfall has disrupted travel across multiple states. N-H-forty four, connecting Srinagar to Kanyakumari, saw significant delays near Nashik yesterday, fourteenth july two thousand and twenty four. Motorists reported waiting for four plus hours due to landslides.

unnormalised: Roadblocks were also reported on SH17 in Karnataka, especially between Mysore and Madikeri. KSRTC bus services are running with delays of upto 2 hrs. Travellers are advised to check road conditions before starting their journey. Several tour operators are offering refunds upto 50% for cancellations.
normalised: Roadblocks were also reported on S-H-seventeen in Karnataka, especially between Mysore and Madikeri. K-S-R-T-C bus services are running with delays of upto two hours. Travellers are advised to check road conditions before starting their journey. Several tour operators are offering refunds upto fifty percent for cancellations.

unnormalised: In related news, the Delhi-Meerut Expressway is experiencing heavy traffic volume. Commuters travelling during peak hours (8 AM - 10 AM) are facing bottlenecks, adding about 30 mins to their journey. The Traffic Police have issued an advisory requesting people to use alternative routes, if possible.
normalised: In related news, the Delhi-Meerut Expressway is experiencing heavy traffic volume. Commuters travelling during peak hours (eight A-M - ten A-M) are facing bottlenecks, adding about thirty minutes to their journey. The Traffic Police have issued an advisory requesting people to use alternative routes, if possible.
